summary: Assassins Sanctuary is a medium sized player home for assassins and is situated near the dark brotherhood sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/38502075-1522233024.png[/img]﻿

[b][size=3][center]
[u][/u][/center][/size][/b][center][b][size=3][u] Summary
[/u][/size][/b]
[b]Assassins Sanctuary is a medium sized player home situated near the dark brotherhood sanctuary in Falkreath. It is best suited for Assassins, Vampires, Necromancers, Daedric or Evil style characters. The Sanctuary costs 13000 gold and comes complete with everything an adventurer should need.
[/b]
[u][size=3][b]Features[/b][/size][/u]

[b][size=1]Display Room
[/size]Armory
Library
Alchemy Room
Master Bedroom
Follower Bedroom
Storage Room 
Main Hall
Forge
Exterior Forge
Bathroom
Vampire Bedroom
Small Prison
Dining Room
Small Secret Vault

[/b][size=3][b][u]Requirements
[/u][/b][/size]
[b]Dragonborn
Dawnguard
Hearthfires

[/b][size=3][b][u]Other

[/u][/b][/size][b]The Sanctuary is fully nav meshed and made for use with long grass and flora mods, It has also been cleaned with Tes Edit. All containers in the mod are safe storage except the bee hive.[/b]

[b][size=3][u]Credits And [/u][u]Permissions[/u][/size][/b]

[size=1][b]All my assets that can be located in the folders labeled K13RAN64 are free for modders to use if credit is given to me, All other assets belong to the creators listed below and you must follow there own requirements if you wish to use those assets.
[/b]
[/size][b][size=3]﻿[/size][/b][size=3][b][/b][/size][size=3][b]Aars
Blary
[/b][/size][size=3][b]Darkrider
Insanity
[/b][/size][size=3][b]Jokerines
Lilith
[/b][/size][size=3][b]Lolicept
[/b][/size][size=3][b]Oaristys
Stroti
Tamira
[/b][/size][size=3][b]Special thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4138425]skyrimlazz[/url] for the display resource.

[/b][/size][b][u][size=3]
This mod is also available for Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/u][/b][/center][center][b][u][size=3][/size][/u][/b][/center]
author: K13RAN64
